doc.title: With All Deliberate Speed: The Legacy of Brown v. Board
doc.plot: Released to commemorate the 50th Anniversary of the historic Brown vs. Board of Education Supreme Court decision, the story of the legal minds and actions that made it possible and the common citizens that participated in the case. The film also explores the social and historical context of the case, as well as the current state of racial integration and the achievement gap in the American public education system.
